title: I really need some help
body: Is there any way to reduce the ping in NYC, I currently moved to some dorm's here and I could understand it if it was just where I was sleeping but it's everywhere I go here, my cousin's house, 4 internet cafe's, it's awful everywhere and yet I don't know what I can do please help

replies.body: Your network might be having a lot of traffic while being on campus, as well as security settings that's making you go through a few hoops.  The issue could also be caused by other local problems if it's happening outside of campus too.  Use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and follow each step to strengthen your connection.  You can also reach out to your campus IT to see if they can help as well.  Hopefully, these tricks will improve your conditions and get you sailing smoothly!
